title: Island
description: An island of content in a document.

type.$comment: This is a special property analogous to JSON-LD's `@type` keyword.

id.$comment: This is a special property analogous to JSON-LD's `@id` keyword.

isAutomatic.description: Whether the island is automatically generated.
isAutomatic.$comment:
When the `--island-wrap` decoding option is used and the island has been
automatically generated by wrapping a document element, then this will be true.
Used when encoding the island back to the source format to determine whether
the explicit island syntax is required or not.

labelType.description: The type of the label for the island.
labelType.$comment: Used during automatic sequential numbering of figures and tables within the document.

label.description: A short label for the chunk.

labelAutomatically.description: Whether the label should be automatically updated.

otherIds.description: Other IDs for the island, in addition to the primary `id`.
otherIds.$comment:
Used to register secondary IDs (e.g. subfigure labels) as link targets.
The primary `id` is typically the last label (main figure/table label),
and these other IDs are also registered for cross-referencing.

style.description: The style to apply to the island.
